objects.specification: A flat rectangular floor plane measuring six meters by six meters with a minimal thickness of 0.1 meters. The surface features a smooth, lightly textured finish in a neutral light gray tone to provide a clean and unobtrusive base for the booth.

A vertical wall panel measuring six meters wide and three meters high with a slim 0.1 meter thickness. It has a matte white finish and clean edges to form the front boundary of the booth, excluding a central two-meter-wide entrance opening.

A sleek modern registration desk with a rectangular profile measuring 1.5 meters wide, 0.5 meters deep, and one meter high. It features a glossy bright orange finish, gentle rounded corners, and minimalist styling to create an inviting point of arrival.
A low platform display stand with a 1 by 1 meter top surface elevated 0.3 meters above the floor. It has a smooth matte white surface and subtly beveled edges to highlight central featured items.
A square pedestal display stand measuring 0.8 by 0.8 meters with a one-meter height. It has a minimalist design and matte white finish, providing an elegant platform for showcasing items.
